about_the_game:
Grasp Of Dread is an asymmetrical horror multiplayer in a (4 vs. 1) mode where one player takes on the role of a monster from another world and the other four players are the monster hunters.

The hunters' goals are to rally and destroy the monster before it gets out.
Goals of the monster - Survive and destroy the hunters at all costs.

Phases

A game session consists of phases during which players have different goals and conditions for accomplishing them.

The hunters' goal in phase one is to make the monster mortal. Yes yes, during the first phase the monster is immortal and can scare and taunt the hunters without restrictions.
[The goal of the hunters in the second phase[/b] is to kill the monster using cold and firearms. At the same time stay alive (ideally).

The goal of the monster in phase one is to be the game director, make the hunters shiver with fear, aim to separate team members and destroy them before they find you.
The monster's goal in phase two is to kill the players and get out of the location. Beware, they have weapons and are very angry.

Key Features:


Immersive Effect: Realistic graphics and sounds, and a minimal user interface provide a fully immersive experience that will keep you engaged.
Unique Monsters: Fight more than 10 types of monsters, each with unique traits, personalities and abilities, making each game session unique and exciting.
Insanity: Don't let your fears take over or the monster will come after you.
Game Modes: Various challenges and additional missions will not make you bored.
Phases: The game consists of two phases, in one you are the victim, in the other - the hunter. Will you be able to avenge the damage done?
Teamwork: Look for clues, strip the monster of immortality work as a team to achieve success.
Asymmetrical Gameplay: Be in the skin of the monster and make human players nervous. Come up with elaborate ways to scare the others.
Gamemastering:The monster is given power and the ability to influence gameplay. Will you be able to maintain superiority over the humans?
Smart Devices: We suggest diving headfirst into the game. Interact with the world around you through smart speakers. The voice from it will tell you where a key item is hiding, alert you in case of danger. The lighting effects will make you shudder in the presence of a monster.
What time is it: Each hunter has a watch present, where you can find out the current state of health, pulse rate and even the temperature in the room. That's not all. Now you will be able to see all of this information on your watch. Your watch reads your heart rate and transmits the information to the game, so that the monster can scare you even more effectively.
Oh yeah, unfortunately you can't recognize the time on it...

CAUTION: PHOTOSENSITIVITY / EPILEPTIC SEIZURES - BE SURE TO READ BEFORE PLAYING

A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or loss of consciousness when exposed to flashing lights or light flashes. These people, including those who have never had seizures or epilepsy before, may experience epileptic symptoms or a seizure while playing a video game. If you or any of your relatives have experienced epileptic seizures or convulsions of any kind, consult a physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY STOP playing and consult a physician if you or your child experiences any of the following symptoms: dizziness, vision changes, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of consciousness, disorientation, or seizures. Parents have a responsibility to watch their children or ask them about the onset of symptoms.

You can reduce the risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures by taking the following precautions: sit farther away from the screen, use a smaller screen, play in a well-lit room, do not play if you are tired or want to sleep.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 6 gb
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700 / AMD Ryzen 7 3800
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 gb
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Grasp Of Dread is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a monster from another world and tries to escape, while the other four players are monster hunters who seek to deal with the undead as soon as possible.
